subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mantoris Robinson scored 14 points and Winthrop used its smothering defense to win another Big South Conference title and reach its fifth N.C.A.A. tournament in six years.
snippet: Mantoris Robinson scored 14 points and Winthrop used its smothering defense to win another Big South Conference title and reach its fifth N.C.A.A. tournament in six years.
